overview: Bolívar Cuts the Sky is a short documentary (45 mins) looking at the coup attempt launched on 23 January by US imperialism and Juan Guaidó against the Maduro government in Venezuela. It covers at the history of Latin America between the 19th and 20th Centuries, and the history of the Bolivarian revolution to contextualise the assault that it presently finds itself under.
title: Bolivar Cuts the Sky
